purpose: To provide a framework for building AI agents that leverage secure computation and decentralized technologies.
principle: Built on Rust, utilizing Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs) for secure computation, and integrates with the Internet Computer Protocol (ICP) for decentralized applications.
reusability: Designed as a framework for developers to create secure AI agents, with potential for integration into decentralized applications.
limitations: As an alpha version, it may have limited documentation and stability issues. It is also primarily targeted at developers familiar with Rust and secure computation technologies.
name: anda

highlight: Integrates AI agent functionality with secure computation using Rust and TEEs.
